column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We started with drinks that were very good: the mint julep
column2: fairly deconstructed with lots of layering and mint and the horses neck which was smokey with bourbon and bright was ginger beer. Our appetizer was the OMG bone marrow
column3: served with thick cuts of sourdough bread
column4: onion relish and sprinkled with steak salt. It was just heavenly!! You can also order marrow to go along with your entree as well.
